References:

2020 ESC Guidelines on sports cardiology and exercise in patients with cardiovascular disease: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32860412/
The proinflammatory effects of chronic excessive exercise: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/30884427/
Source of the U-shaped curve: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4451435/
Personalised exercise dose: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/29301027/
The effects of endurance exercise on the heart: panacea or poison?: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32152528/
Exercise and the heart--the harm of too little and too much: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/25757005/
Training for Longevity: The Reverse J-Curve for Exercise: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32848273/ (suggests a slightly lower upper limit for benefit)
